DrummondFull ProfessorInstitute of ComputingUFFFGCS Associate EditorE-mail: lucia@ic.uff.br AddressOffice number 525IC Secretary BuildingAv. Gal Milton Tavaresde Souza, s/n – NiteróiCEP 24210-310 I am Full Professor at the Institute of Computing, Fluminense Federal University (UFF). My current research interest are in High-Performance Computing, Clouds, and Parallel and Distributed Computing. I am a CNPq Level 1 Researcher, at a Brazilian research agency,  and Cientista do Estado  Rio de Janeiro (FAPERJ). I have more than 100 publications in conferences and journals, and have advised several master’s and Ph.D. works, some of them in cotutelle at Sorbonne and Avignon Universities. I was the coordinator of Stricto Sensu Pos-Graduate Programs at Fluminense Federal University from 2019 to 2022. I have been on several program committees, such as HPDC, ICS, IEEE CLUSTER , CCGRID , Europar, IPDPS and Supercomputing. I was the Program Chair at SBAC 2016 and 2020 conferences. I was the coordinator of the Special Commission on Computer Architecture and High-Performance Processing of the Brazilian Computer Society (SBC), from 2019 to 2023, and I am in the Management Committee of this commission currently. I am an associate editor of FGCS journal.
